nodes.excerpt: Social Image Generator is a WordPress plugin that automatically creates social share images for your content, increasing your social engagement and saving you hours of tedious work.

nodes.excerpt: Powered by tens of thousands of popular fully responsive visuals, SYQEL VJ is a simple to use desktop application that enables users to instantly visualize their mic or desktop audio feeds & easily use it as a window source in OBS or other broadcasting apps.
nodes.title: SYQEL VJ - Automatic responsive visuals for your streams
nodes.author: Chris Messina

localize.description: SYQEL VJ是一款简单易用的桌面应用程序，它能让用户将他们的麦克风或桌面音频馈送即时可视化，并轻松地将其作为OBS或其他广播应用程序的窗口源。
localize.tagline: 为您的流媒体提供自动响应的视觉效果

localize.description: SYQEL VJ是一款簡單易用的桌面應用程序，它能讓用戶將他們的麥克風或桌面音頻饋送即時可視化，並輕鬆地將其作爲OBS或其他廣播應用程序的窗口源。
localize.tagline: 爲您的流媒體提供自動響應的視覺效果

nodes.excerpt: Record your screen and webcam. No installation required. Protected by end-to-end encryption. Free to use on Windows, Mac, Linux, iOS, Android.
nodes.title: CALIPIO Screen Recorder - Free and secure screen recorder
nodes.author: Daniel Modler

localize.description: 记录你的屏幕和网络摄像头。无需安装。受端到端加密保护。可在Windows、Mac、Linux、iOS、Android上免费使用。
localize.tagline: 免费和安全的屏幕记录器

localize.description: 記錄你的屏幕和網絡攝像頭。無需安裝。受端到端加密保護。可在Windows、Mac、Linux、iOS、Android上免費使用。
localize.tagline: 免費和安全的屏幕記錄器

nodes.excerpt: Generate a PDF from a URL. Simple, quick and easy. The idea behind this is simple. Don't spend your development time building complicated PDF infrastructure. Let us handle your PDF generation with a simple, asynchronous API.
nodes.title: PlutoPDF - A URL to PDF converter wrapped behind a simple API.
nodes.author: Scott Walker

localize.description: 从一个URL生成一个PDF。简单、快捷、方便。这背后的想法很简单。不要把您的开发时间花在构建复杂的PDF基础架构上。让我们用一个简单的、异步的API来处理您的PDF生成。
localize.tagline: 一个包裹在一个简单的API后面的URL到PDF转换器。

localize.description: 從一個URL生成一個PDF。簡單、快捷、方便。這背後的想法很簡單。不要把您的開發時間花在構建複雜的PDF基礎架構上。讓我們用一個簡單的、異步的API來處理您的PDF生成。
localize.tagline: 一個包裹在一個簡單的API後面的URL到PDF轉換器。

nodes.excerpt: Everyone speaks the same language - visual 🌅. So make your backend - visual! Draw your backend architecture, code right in the browser, and execute - all on the same whiteboard. Forget about logs or having to guess what your code does. SEE it in real time 😍
nodes.title: STATEWIZE - Visual software development ecosystem. Draw + Code + Execute
nodes.author: Lev Perlman

localize.description: 大家都在说同一种语言--可视化🌅。所以，让你的后台--可视化! 在浏览器中画出你的后端架构和代码，并在同一白板上执行。忘记日志或猜测你的代码做什么。实时查看😍
localize.tagline: 可视化软件开发生态系统。绘制+代码+执行

localize.description: 大家都在說同一種語言--可視化🌅。所以，讓你的後臺--可視化! 在瀏覽器中畫出你的後端架構和代碼，並在同一白板上執行。忘記日誌或猜測你的代碼做什麼。實時查看😍
localize.tagline: 可視化軟件開發生態系統。繪製+代碼+執行

nodes.excerpt: Anonymously vouch for the best engineers among your LinkedIn connections and get $1500 for everyone who gets hired. You get assured $20 for just syncing your LinkedIn. Help your friends get connected to top Y-Combinator founders directly. No recruiters.
nodes.title: Hiring Club - Recommend engineers to top startups and earn $1500 per hire
nodes.author: Michael Seibel

localize.description: 匿名为你的LinkedIn关系中最优秀的工程师打保票，每个被录用的人都能得到1500美元。只要同步你的LinkedIn，你就能保证获得20美元。帮助你的朋友直接与Y-Combinator的顶级创始人取得联系。没有招聘人员。
localize.tagline: 向顶级创业公司推荐工程师，每聘一次就能赚1500元。

localize.description: 匿名爲你的LinkedIn關係中最優秀的工程師打保票，每個被錄用的人都能得到1500美元。只要同步你的LinkedIn，你就能保證獲得20美元。幫助你的朋友直接與Y-Combinator的頂級創始人取得聯繫。沒有招聘人員。
localize.tagline: 向頂級創業公司推薦工程師，每聘一次就能賺1500元。

nodes.excerpt: RapidReg - a scheduling and form building tool that includes all you need in one place, at a price you can't beat! Registrations, Form & survey builders, Availability calendars & online booking, Pricing and payments, and go green with planted trees!

nodes.author: Chris Collins

localize.description: RapidReg - 一个日程安排和表格建立工具，包括所有你需要在一个地方，在一个价格你不能打！注册，表格和调查问卷建立，可用性日历和在线预订，定价和付款。注册，表格和调查建设者，可用性日历和在线预订，定价和付款，并去绿色种植的树木!
localize.tagline: 表格，预订和无限制的日程安排，植树。

localize.tagline: 表格，預訂和無限制的日程安排，植樹。

nodes.excerpt: Recursive is a puzzle game about recursion, patterns, and programming. It is the perfect game for people who love hard puzzles. Your goal is to help little robots collect all gems by finding the correct pattern and translating it into a short program.
nodes.title: Recursive! - A puzzle game about recursion, patterns, and programming.
nodes.author: Saber Chaabani

localize.description: 递归是一款关于递归、模式和编程的益智游戏。这是一个完美的游戏，喜欢困难的谜题的人。你的目标是帮助小机器人收集所有的宝石，找到正确的模式，并将其转化为一个简短的程序。
localize.tagline: 一个关于递归、模式和编程的益智游戏。

localize.description: 遞歸是一款關於遞歸、模式和編程的益智遊戲。這是一個完美的遊戲，喜歡困難的謎題的人。你的目標是幫助小機器人收集所有的寶石，找到正確的模式，並將其轉化爲一個簡短的程序。
localize.tagline: 一個關於遞歸、模式和編程的益智遊戲。

nodes.excerpt: Still is designed to help you relieve symptoms of Anxiety and OCD. Using targeted messages to help pull your focus out of your anxiety or OCD as well as breathing exercises, Still helps you avoid the worst of your condition and stop it from taking hold.
nodes.title: Still - An app to help relieve symptoms of anxiety & OCD
nodes.author: Tom Norton

localize.description: Still旨在帮助你缓解焦虑和强迫症的症状。利用有针对性的信息帮助您将注意力从焦虑或强迫症中拉出来，以及呼吸练习，Still帮助您避免最糟糕的状况，并阻止它的发生。
localize.tagline: 一款帮助缓解焦虑和强迫症症状的应用程序。

localize.description: Still旨在幫助你緩解焦慮和強迫症的症狀。利用有針對性的信息幫助您將注意力從焦慮或強迫症中拉出來，以及呼吸練習，Still幫助您避免最糟糕的狀況，並阻止它的發生。
localize.tagline: 一款幫助緩解焦慮和強迫症症狀的應用程序。

nodes.excerpt: Heart Reports V2 can generate separate blood sugar, blood pressure, blood oxygen, heart rate, activity and sleep reports. All perfectly designed for printing, so you can easily show your Apple Health data to your doctor. Now with Widgets and Shortcuts support.
nodes.title: Heart Reports v2 - Export beautiful PDF health reports from the iOS Health app
nodes.author: Viszt Péter

localize.description: Heart Reports V2可以单独生成血糖、血压、血氧、心率、活动和睡眠报告。所有报告都经过完美设计，可供打印，因此你可以轻松地向医生展示你的 Apple 健康数据。现在支持Widgets和快捷键。
localize.tagline: 从iOS健康应用中导出精美的PDF健康报告。

localize.description: Heart Reports V2可以單獨生成血糖、血壓、血氧、心率、活動和睡眠報告。所有報告都經過完美設計，可供打印，因此你可以輕鬆地向醫生展示你的 Apple 健康數據。現在支持Widgets和快捷鍵。
localize.tagline: 從iOS健康應用中導出精美的PDF健康報告。

nodes.excerpt: Color Spark is a Figma plugin that allows designers to apply a colour scheme to their design prototypes in seconds. Focus on your design, make it stunning, and stop wasting time.

nodes.excerpt: Pocket self-care assistant that helps you stay positive and avoid negativity. JOI is a perfect tool for keeping a mood journal in a simple and funny way. Observe the correlation between your mood and activities during the day to see the patterns in your life.

nodes.author: Chris Messina

localize.description: 袖珍自理助手，帮助你保持积极向上，避免消极情绪。JOI是一款以简单有趣的方式记录心情日记的完美工具。观察你的心情和一天中的活动之间的关联，看看你生活中的模式。
localize.tagline: 口袋里的自理助手，让你更快乐。

localize.description: 袖珍自理助手，幫助你保持積極向上，避免消極情緒。JOI是一款以簡單有趣的方式記錄心情日記的完美工具。觀察你的心情和一天中的活動之間的關聯，看看你生活中的模式。

nodes.excerpt: data analytics company for the music industry and enables users to analyze the acquired data and use them as required. PlayTreks data analytics services can assist in product development, identifying potential market gaps, improve efficiency, extend reach.

nodes.excerpt: Trexy allows you to track your own expenses. You can also track lending and borrowing records between your family and friends. Multi-currency comes in handy regardless of which currency you spend on. Expenses are grouped by category in monthly pie-chart.
nodes.title: Trexy - Track expenses and debts easily with multi-currency support.
nodes.author: Meng Taing

localize.description: Trexy允许你跟踪自己的支出。您还可以追踪家人和朋友之间的借贷记录。无论你用哪种货币消费，多币种都很方便。在每月的饼状图中，支出按类别进行分组。
localize.tagline: 支持多种货币，轻松追踪费用和债务。

localize.description: Trexy允許你跟蹤自己的支出。您還可以追蹤家人和朋友之間的借貸記錄。無論你用哪種貨幣消費，多幣種都很方便。在每月的餅狀圖中，支出按類別進行分組。
localize.tagline: 支持多種貨幣，輕鬆追蹤費用和債務。

nodes.excerpt: 💰 Did you make bank on $GME, $AMC or anything Elon mentioned? Did you cash in at your startup's IPO? 👉 Think you can invest in this fund? You probably aren't rich enough. 🤑 This could be the fund for you.

nodes.excerpt: ISP Logger is an automated internet speed performance analytics tool. A small open source script performs a speed test on a docker image every hour and can be analysed on the easy to use Dashboard.
nodes.title: ISP Logger - Automated internet performance monitoring
nodes.author: Ronald Langeveld

localize.description: ISP Logger是一款自动化的网速性能分析工具。一个小型的开源脚本每隔一小时对docker镜像进行一次速度测试，并可以在易于使用的Dashboard上进行分析。
localize.tagline: 互联网性能自动监测

localize.description: ISP Logger是一款自動化的網速性能分析工具。一個小型的開源腳本每隔一小時對docker鏡像進行一次速度測試，並可以在易於使用的Dashboard上進行分析。
localize.tagline: 互聯網性能自動監測

nodes.excerpt: React Bundle by Flatlogic is a collection of various templates. You can see three admin templates with classic design, one with material one, a mobile starter template, a user management template, and an accounting template.
nodes.title: React Bundle - All premium React themes and templates

nodes.excerpt: Toad is the simplest URL shortener with a built-in API, detailed analytics, and custom domain support. Toad is built to be fun yet powerful. What's stopping you? Make the leap!
nodes.title: Toad - The simplest URL shortener
nodes.author: Zach Waterfield

localize.description: Toad是最简单的URL缩短器，具有内置的API，详细的分析和自定义域名支持。Toad的设计既有趣又强大。是什么阻止了你？跃跃欲试吧
